prompt:
Please describe the most impressive statue in the world, and explain why it's so noteworthy.
The Statue of Unity is the world’s tallest statue, standing at 182 meters (600 feet) tall and located in Kevadia, India. It was unveiled in October 2018 to celebrate 70 years since the formation of India as a sovereign state. The statue depicts a group of people from different backgrounds holding hands, representing unity and harmony among all Indians. Its sheer size makes it an impressive sight to behold.
